name: Get In "The Clique" Quiz | Authors | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is Skye Hamilton's clique called? This is found in the book "It's Not Easy Being Mean".
questions.explanation:
DSL Daters.

	They're called the DSL Daters because they make superfast connections with boys.  Skye is the eighth grade alpha.

questions.text: Massie likes Josh. This can be found in the book "Invasion Of the Boy-Snatchers."
questions.explanation:
false.

	Massie likes Derrington.  Alicia likes Josh.

questions.text: How many sleepovers is Layne allowed to go to per month? This can be found in the book "It's Not Easy Being Mean."
questions.explanation:
1.

	Layne is allowed to put her sleeping bag next to Claire's at the sleepover.  This is one of the demands that TPC has to give in to so they can have the key.

questions.text: Who does Massie kick out of the Pretty Committee in the book "It's Not Easy Being Mean"?
questions.explanation:
Claire.

	She kicked Claire out, but Claire was reinstated as part of her and Layne's negotiation to give Massie the key. One of the other negotiations Massie had to give in to was that Layne was allowed to go to a sleepover.

questions.text: Where did Claire and Layne find the key? This can be found in the book "It's Not Easy Being Mean."
questions.explanation:
under Chris's mattress.

	Chris is Layne's brother. His last name is Abeley.

questions.text: Whose screenname is sexysportsbabe? This can be found in the book "The Clique."
questions.explanation:
Kristen.

	Kristen is poor.  Her last name is Gregory.

questions.text: Whose screenname is bigredhead? This can be found in the book "The Clique."
questions.explanation:
Dylan.

	Dylan is always on some diet. Her last name is Marvil.

questions.text: Whose screenname is holagurrl? This can be found in the book "The Clique."
questions.explanation:
Alicia.

	Claire told Alicia to wear shorts over tights and to tell Kristen and Dylan that.  Alicia's last name is Rivera.

questions.text: What is the name of Chris's horse? This can be found in the book "The Clique."
questions.explanation:
Tricky.

	The name of Layne's horse is Trixie. The name of Massie's horse is Brownie.

questions.text: What sport does Derrington play? This can be found in the book "The Pretty Committee Strikes Back."
questions.explanation:
soccer.

	Derrington is the star soccer goalie. His real name is Derrick Harrington.
